org.apache.spark.streaming

Class BatchCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.BatchCounter

  • public class BatchCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that counts the number of started / completed batches. This is implemented using a StreamingListener. Constructing a new instance automatically registers a StreamingListener on the given StreamingContext.

      • getNumCompletedBatches

        public int getNumCompletedBatches()

      • getNumStartedBatches

      • waitUntilBatchesCompleted

        public boolean waitUntilBatchesCompleted(int expectedNumCompletedBatches,
                                long timeout)
        Wait until expectedNumCompletedBatches batches are completed, or timeout. Return true if expectedNumCompletedBatches batches are completed. Otherwise, return false to indicate it's timeout.

        Parameters:
        expectedNumCompletedBatches - the expectedNumCompletedBatches batches to wait
        timeout - the maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • waitUntilBatchesStarted

        public boolean waitUntilBatchesStarted(int expectedNumStartedBatches,
                              long timeout)
        Wait until expectedNumStartedBatches batches are completed, or timeout. Return true if expectedNumStartedBatches batches are completed. Otherwise, return false to indicate it's timeout.

        Parameters:
        expectedNumStartedBatches - the expectedNumStartedBatches batches to wait
        timeout - the maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
